summary: The video appears to be a setup for a ghost hunting session. The speaker mentions that it is snowing outside, creating a quiet environment. They inform viewers that they will mostly be out of the frame during the video but assure that no noises will be made. The repetitive 'Røde' sounds suggest testing or checking the microphone equipment, likely a Røde brand microphone. The speaker concludes by noting that they have only recorded during daylight hours so far, indicating a shift to nighttime recording for the ghost hunting activity.
keywords: ghost hunting, snow, quiet, Røde, microphone, daylight, nighttime, recording
creator_demographic: Age: Unknown, Gender: Unknown, Geographic Location: Unknown
